## Reservation card object

```json
{
    "ccNumber": "",
    "ccName": "Guest Name",
    "ccExpirationMonth": "12",
    "ccExpirationYear": "2019",
    "cvc": "111"
      
}
```

Property | Required | Type | Description
-------- | -------- | ---- | ----------- 
`ccNumber` | yes | string | Encrypted card number 
`ccName` | yes | string | 
`ccExpirationMonth` | yes | string | 
`ccExpirationYear` | yes | string |
`cvc` | yes | int
